content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) and another stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt(position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt(position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Inserter system at position(39.5, -79.5)
Consists of burner inserter(position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter(position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
 -  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them, as seen in the case of burner mining drills and burners inserters with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.
### Errors when using steam engines
 -  Make sure that steam engines are connected to a boiler and a power source to function properly, as seen in the case of steam engine with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.
### Errors when using electricity groups
 -  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network to function properly, as seen in the case of electricity group with status EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK.
### Errors when using offshore pumps
 -  Ensure that offshore pumps have a power source and are properly connected to a pipe group to function properly.
### Errors when using belt groups
 -  Ensure that belt groups are properly connected to transport belts and have a power source to function properly.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
